name: Bitphomet: Pixel Devil
description:
This is my mostly finished entry for #LowRezJam. All assets and code were created within a 1 week period.

It's a simple infinite runner action game where you fight slimes, fireballs, and skeleton people while collecting coins and making sure the ground doesn't fall out beneath your feet. 
The controls are WASD to move, left click to shoot and right click to slash. I'm sure there are bugs so let me know in the comments, or suggest features/tell me your opinions etc

And if you enjoyed it you can donate to my patreon for more games like this:
https://www.patreon.com/typotromic
